preqs: Students enrolled in course code 0816 must be granted permission to undertake this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 21, 41, 50}
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTB1010, BTC1110, BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200} AND  Incompatible with course version in {1941, 2224, 3381, 4423} with course status in {ENROLLED})
Unit was previously coded {BTC1110%, BTF1010%, BTP1010, BTW1010, BTW1200%, BTX1010%, DEB101, DEB1010%, DEB111, FIN101, FIN1010%, FIN111, FIN11101, FIN114, GBU1201%, TBB1201, TBW1010, TBX1010%}
Unit was previously coded {BTC1110%, BTF1010%, BTP1010, BTW1010, BTW1200%, BTX1010%, DEB101, DEB1010%, DEB111, FIN101, FIN1010%, FIN111, FIN11101, FIN114, GBU1201%, TBB1201, TBW1010, TBX1010%}
For COURSE_CODE IN {0816} Do Permission required Otherwise true
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTB1010, BTC1110, BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200} AND  Incompatible with course version in {1941, 2224, 3381, 4423} with course status in {ENROLLED})
For COURSE_CODE IN {0816} Do Permission required Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 21, 41, 50}

description: Liability for defective products; liability for misleading advice or information; contract law; agency law; partnership law; introduction to company law; company officers' duties.
